txt.en: 'The orchard is to the west, at the very base of the hill.'
'I will bring these apples to Idele for wrapping, but this one is for me.'
'I am resting for just a moment.'
'It will still be some days before we are ready to march to war.'
'I will fight the other clans. They are no longer our kin.'
'The apples of Tal Methedras are the finest anywhere. It is the mountain air.'
